CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 26, 1959, pg. A9 reads: "Ushers Give Baskets - Free Christmas baskets were distributed to 120 families this week by members of the Ushers Alliance of Pittsburgh, which includes usher boards of Macedonia, Ebenezer and Wesley Center Churches. The committee, left to right include: Hilliard Weaver, Mrs. Ceola Wingfield, Mrs. Sallie Barrows, John H. Jones, chairman; Mrs. Emily Addison, Mrs. Edith Daniels, Charles Daniels, president; William Stitts and the Rev. Charles H. Foggie, pastor of Wesley Center. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Ushers Alliance of Pittsburgh members, from left: Hilliard Weaver, Ceola Wingfield, Sallie Barrows, John H. Jones, Emily Addison, Edith Daniels, Charles Daniels, William Stitts, and Rev. Charles H. Foggie, packing charity Christmas baskets in basement interior with patterned linoleum floor and light colored walls with dark wainscot
